Package org.neo4j.internal.schema.constraints

Class ConstraintDescriptorImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.internal.schema.constraints.ConstraintDescriptorImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConstraintDescriptor, IndexBackedConstraintDescriptor, NodeExistenceConstraintDescriptor, NodeKeyConstraintDescriptor, RelExistenceConstraintDescriptor, UniquenessConstraintDescriptor, SchemaDescriptorSupplier, SchemaRule
    public class ConstraintDescriptorImplementation
extends Object
implements ConstraintDescriptor, NodeExistenceConstraintDescriptor, NodeKeyConstraintDescriptor, RelExistenceConstraintDescriptor, UniquenessConstraintDescriptor
    Internal representation of a graph constraint, including the schema unit it targets (eg. label-property combination) and how that schema unit is constrained (eg. "has to exist", or "must be unique").
